--- Pacifix /Crossroads ---

Pacifix heaves with all of his strenght, and manages to finally lift off 
the slag heap that was building up. He throws it on top of Arty. He 
surveils the damage. He spots one of the bots retreating, "LET THE 
BOT RETREAT," his yell echos around the room. "GRIMLOCK, 
GET OVER HERE NOW!" He starts heading towards Grimlock.

Crossroads would have smiled, "Yes I'm talking to you, that would 
be because I'm not only a sword and shield." The blade flares up 
with white plasma wisps. "Though I'm probably not needed right 
now, this fight appears to be coming to an end."

(OOC: Jordan, I changed the colour to white instead of blue. =)
